{
  "name": "gulpfile",
  "version": "1.2.3",
  "description": "A personal gulpfile configuration that reads the package.json for a gulpfilePaths property",
  "main": "index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "echo \"Error: no test specified\" && exit 1"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/tatumcreative/gulpfile"
  },
  "author": {
    "name": "Greg Tatum"
  },
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/tatumcreative/gulpfile/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/tatumcreative/gulpfile",
  "dependencies": {
    "browserify": "^8.0.2",
    "gulp-consolidate": "^0.1.2",
    "gulp-iconfont": "^1.0.0",
    "gulp-jshint": "^1.8.4",
    "gulp-plumber": "^0.6.6",
    "gulp-react": "^2.0.0",
    "gulp-rename": "^1.2.0",
    "gulp-replace": "^0.5.0",
    "gulp-ruby-sass": "^0.7.1",
    "gulp-sass": "^1.2.4",
    "gulp-shell": "^0.2.11",
    "gulp-sourcemaps": "^1.1.1",
    "gulp-uglify": "^1.0.2",
    "gulp-util": "^3.0.0",
    "jshint-stylish": "^1.0.0",
    "lodash": "^2.4.1",
    "minifyify": "^4.0.4",
    "vinyl-source-stream": "^1.0.0",
    "watchify": "^2.2.1"
  }
}
